                    int x,
                    int y)
Parameters:

y - The desired new y location
Returns:
Whether or not the move is valid

                  int player,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  char d)
Parameters:
players - An array of all players in the game

d - The direction of the wall
Returns:

                   int x,
                   int y,
                   boolean undo)
Parameters:
p - The player who is being moved

y - The new y location
